perturbation.original_text: 1. EXTENSION OF SERVICE AGREEMENT. Subject to all other terms and conditions set forth herein, as of the date of this agreement, LEADER maintain the software for an additional five years.
perturbation.changed_text: 1. EXTENSION OF SERVICE AGREEMENT. Subject to all other terms and conditions set forth herein, as of the date of this agreement, LEADER shall maintain the software for an additional five years, provided EZJR continues to meet its financial obligations as outlined in a separate agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause states LEADER will maintain the software for five years. The modified clause adds a condition ('provided EZJR continues to meet its financial obligations') that wasn't explicitly mentioned, making the maintenance obligation conditional. This contradicts the unconditional nature of the original statement.

perturbation.original_text: 11. ATTORNEYS' FEES. Each party will pay its or his own legal fees and other expenses in connection with the preparation of this Agreement and the sale of Assets in accordance with this Agreement. However, if any legal action or other proceeding is brought for the enforcement of this Agreement, or because or arising out of an alleged dispute, breach, default or misrepresentation in connection with any of the provisions of this Agreement, the prevailing party will be entitled to recover reasonable attorney's fees and other costs incurred in that action or proceeding, in addition to any other relief to which it or he may be entitled.
perturbation.changed_text: 11. ATTORNEYS' FEES. Each party will pay its or his own legal fees and other expenses in connection with the preparation of this Agreement and the sale of Assets in accordance with this Agreement. However, if any legal action or other proceeding is brought for the enforcement of this Agreement, or because or arising out of an alleged dispute, breach, default or misrepresentation in connection with any of the provisions of this Agreement, the prevailing party may be entitled to recover attorney's fees and other costs incurred in that action or proceeding, but only up to $5,000, regardless of the actual costs incurred, in addition to any other relief to which it or he may be entitled.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause allows the prevailing party to recover 'reasonable attorney's fees'. The modified version caps the recoverable fees at $5,000. This introduces a contradiction because 'reasonable' fees could exceed $5,000, and the modified clause limits recovery regardless of the actual reasonable expenses.

perturbation.original_text: 8. SUCCESSORS AND ASSIGNS. This Agreement will be binding on, and will inure to the benefit of, the parties and their respective successors and assigns, and shall not confer any rights or remedies on any other Persons.
perturbation.changed_text: 8. SUCCESSORS AND ASSIGNS. This Agreement will be binding on, and will inure to the benefit of, the parties and their respective successors and assigns, except that Leader Act Ltd HK's obligations can only be assigned to a subsidiary with express written consent from EZJR, and shall not confer any rights or remedies on any other Persons.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause states the agreement is binding on successors and assigns without limitation. The modified clause adds a restriction on Leader's ability to assign its obligations, requiring express written consent from EZJR. This contradicts the unrestricted assignment implied in the original wording.
